ej,valeb102,M,roe-r901,Mocked umpire $the Tangers bench exploded after the bases-loaded walk; HP umpire Rocky Roe came to the dugout and told Rangers manager Bobby Valentine that he worked better in a quiet environment; Valentine turned to his players and said that they could not yell at Roe any more; Valentine was ejected by Roe

ej,willj107,M,hirsj901,Interference call $Blue Jays manager Williams ejected by HP umpire Hirschbeck when umpire ruled Fernandez interfered with ball while running to 1st after 3rd strike bouned away from catcher

$Catcher made a weak throw which pitcher caught and then threw wildly to 2nd, allowing runner to take 3rd
ej,willj107,M,johnm901,Check swing strike $Blue Jays manager Williams ejected by 1B umpire Johnson for arguing check swing strike call to Whitt
$Henderson's single hit Musselman on inside of right knee; after rolling on the ground in great pain for several minutes, he was helped off the field
